edu.packt.neuralnet

Class OutputLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.packt.neuralnet.NeuralLayer
      • edu.packt.neuralnet.OutputLayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompetitiveLayer

    public class OutputLayer
extends NeuralLayer
    OutputLayer This class represents an output layer of a neural network, inheriting from NeuralLayer, which contains all basic definitions of a Neural Layer
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Alan de Souza, Fabio Soares

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setNextLayer(NeuralLayer layer)
      setNextLayer This method prevents any attempt to link this layer to a next one, provided that this should be always the last
      void setPreviousLayer(NeuralLayer layer)
      setPreviousLayer This method links this layer to the previous one
